name: Farmax.io v1.7 Itchy Update
description:
A full game created by me

-IMPORTANT-

How to play

<>^v to move

Space to hit ores and kill enemies and trade

Enter to craft

A and D to switch between crafts

H to see crafts better

Click to place down item (In creative mode)

N to switch to next item (In creative mode)

E to hide everthing thats in the way

/ to sprint

-MORE IMPORTANT-

When the screen turns black you are not dead its nighttime and is turning to next day

You have to unlock seeing how much of an item you have

Click options before starting for a much much better experience

Next update might be Key Binding

Your emeralds are saved when you game over. Don't worry [: .

You have to touch enemies to kill them which also results in you taking damage

-SHOUT OUTS-

The Internet for the cursor

Beepbox.co

Cooltext.com

Scratch.mit.edu

-Cool Random Stuff-

Based off of minecraft

The rarest item is a Questionable ore

You Can Actually Kill Enemies Without Taking Damage
